response.overview: The 1991 Walt Disney World 4th of July special saw a considerable change from previous 4th of July Spectaculars with the word “spectacular” dropped from the title replaced by Disney’s Great American Celebration.  Our hosts, Connie Sellecca and Robert Guillaume kick things off from Disneyland with Tevin Campbell performing Sweet Freedom while Mickey embarks on a coast to coast hot air balloon ride finishing the song from EPCOT Center’s American Adventure along with a marching band and Disney characters.
response.title: 1991 Disney Great American Celebration
